item.description:
What's New in TabTab 1.3.2:

  • Right-click on tabs to access secondary actions, including adding apps to ignore list
  • Completely revamped app settings page
  • Improved performance: smoother operation and faster app switching
  • New features:
    • Option to disable default hotkeys (opt/cmd tab) and use quick search only
    • Close individual windows with cmd+w
    • Ability to ignore specific apps when mouse activation is enabled
  • Bug fixes:
    • Fixed Chrome's "find in page" window interference
    • Fixed Safari not closing properly with cmd+q
    • Fixed various crashes
    • Fixed issues for non-English users
  • Improvements:
    • Enhanced mouse activation sensitivity
    • Added support for English app name search for non-English users
